reviews.title: Great all around
reviews.comment: Controls are actually quite good - better than some of this genre. Graphics are well done. Fun overall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love the game. Graphics are amazing. The  controls are really hard to get use to for me though. Could you add like a secondary controls one were it is just a button on both sides to turn instead of the sliders. Thanks Amazing game though
reviews.author: Tyler Chaika

reviews.title: Awesome, great graphics, sound, over
reviews.comment: Awesome, great graphics, and sound. I would recommend this to a friend or family members.
reviews.author: Geoff Eastman

reviews.title: Fix the controls please
reviews.comment: It has so bad controls and worst game on android for all I know this game has good graphics but fox the controls. All I ask is just, put tilting action on and put videos of random people game play. Like pick people off the street and make a really hard challenge if they beat the challenge they get the game free but if they don\'t have the 4g android they have to past half you have to part half. They should do that for android you can do this if you want but just fix the controls please that\'s all I ask=5star

reviews.title: Uber cool
reviews.comment: Plays good love the controls easy to have fun with this game going to download full ri now bee!

reviews.title: Top notch
reviews.comment: Loads of fun, controls actually quite intuitive and great graphics.
reviews.author: Kevin Wright

reviews.title: Cool.
reviews.comment: Pretty good. Plays well graphics are great.

reviews.title: Best Android Game
reviews.comment: Cool graphics, easy handling, awesome missions, music is great ALL ROUNDER.
reviews.author: Shahbaz Ali

reviews.title: Really cool
reviews.comment: Awesome snowboarding game! Intuitive controls, good physics and graphics makes it \"must have\" app for everyone who love snowboarding or other winter sports.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Good stuff.  Might be nice to be able to have the option to turn with the accelerometer,  but I assume there is a reason  they didn\'t include that.
reviews.author: Tony Conz

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: You/should/be/able/to/customize/what/to/wear/other/than/that/runs/great/and/works/great/love/it!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: I love it! I wish you could change the character to a girl. And the controls are cunfusing could you do tilt instead? Thank. I love this game it so cool!!!
reviews.author: Jeffrey Seymour

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Awesome game, easy to use after a few goes. Well worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome game! Cant say anything else controls are awesome and plays well on my galaxy blaze
reviews.author: Jeryll Ballesteros

reviews.title: No gyro control, only 1 game, no exit
reviews.comment: NO GYRO control option(had to use thumb joystick), no \"EXIT\", and when you can quit with \"home\", IT STAYS RUNNING IN THE BACKGROUND, (found it still running in \"task manager\', had to tap the \'x\' 4times just to get it to shut down),  most games are locked (wanting you to buy it). The plus side: good graphics and permissions don\'t steal your personal contacts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its alright if you never been snowboarding before yeah!!!
reviews.comment: This  is a good way of knowing what to expect out there when you do the real deed for your first time not to bad for ae mobile game i like it :)\")
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The gameplay is fun  and simple. What i am really interested to see if they can make is kind of like EA\'S ssx series and give the characters their own style of funky fresh tricks
reviews.author: Aaron Alston

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: Graphics are perfect, audio is good, lots of room for expansion.  Great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wt f
reviews.comment: The grafics are good, the comtrols are not bad, but on free game u cant get more than 9 stars, 3 levels to choose from (which last about 5sec each) so I beat it in less than 5 mins. 3 gay stars. I should of done 2
reviews.author: Shawn Alexander

reviews.title: Just yes
reviews.comment: It\'s no SSX, but it\'s the closest thing to SSX level awesome I\'ve seen. 5 stars for the graphics and nostalgia trip.
reviews.author: A Google User
